summary: Removes Talvas and Neloths candlelight sandpackage so they stop using candlelight. Its really quite peaceful when they stop it :D
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][color=#a61c00][center]Stop Spaming Candelight[/center][/color][/b][/size][size=3][center][b]
[color=#6aa84f]What does this mod do?[/color][/b][color=#6aa84f]
Removes Talvas and Neloths candlelight sandpackage so they stop using candlelight![/color]

[color=#93c47d]Small & easy, mod please enjoy![/color][/center][/size]
[color=#93c47d][size=3][i]Other Fantasy Tel Mithryn Experience Enhancing mods![/i][/size][/color]
[size=4][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43030/?]Fantasy Tel Mithryn[/url]
[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50210/?]Tel Mithryn Magical Clutter[/url][/size][size=4]
[/size]
author: SiennGrace
